field.label: Interface
field.help: Choose which interface this gateway applies to.

field.label: Address Family
field.help: Choose the Internet Protocol this gateway uses.

field.label: Upstream Gateway
field.help: This will select the above gateway as a default gateway candidate.

field.label: Far Gateway
field.help: This will allow the gateway to exist outside of the interface subnet.

field.label: Disable Gateway Monitoring
field.help: This will consider this gateway as always being "up".

field.label: Disable Host Route
field.help: Do not create a dedicated host route for this monitor.

field.label: Monitor IP
field.help: Enter an alternative address here to be used to monitor the link. This is used for the quality RRD graphs as well as the load balancer entries. Use this if the gateway does not respond to ICMP echo requests (pings).

field.label: Mark Gateway as Down
field.help: This will force this gateway to be considered "down".

field.label: Priority
field.help: Choose a value between 1 and 255. Influences sort order when selecting a (default) gateway, lower means more important.

field.label: Weight
field.help: Weight for this gateway when used in a gateway group. Specificed as an integer number between 1 and 5. Default equals 1.

field.label: Latency Low Threshold
field.help: Low threshold for latency in milliseconds. Default is 200.

field.label: Latency High Threshold
field.help: High threshold for latency in milliseconds. Default is 500.

field.label: Packet Loss Low Threshold
field.help: Low threshold for packet loss in %. Default is 10.

field.label: Packet Loss High Threshold
field.help: High thresholds for packet loss in %. Default is 20.

field.label: Probe Interval
field.help: How often that an ICMP probe will be sent in seconds. Default is 1.

field.label: Time Period
field.help: The time period over which results are averaged. Default is 60.

field.label: Loss Interval
field.help: Time interval before packets are treated as lost. Default is 4 (four times the probe interval).

field.label: Data Length
field.help: Specify the number of data bytes to be sent. Default is 0.
